name: Hawk
actions_desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 slashing damage.
special_abilities_desc: The hawk has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.
description: AD 6 Strange Things Millionaires Do With Their Money, But Most of Us Have Never Tried By The Penny Hoarder In the Unapproachable East, hawks could be found around the Tannath Gap.[6] Beyond the Prime Material plane, hawks could be found in the forests of Barovia.[7] Some of the best-trained hawks were trained by the elven House Korianthil.[8] Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue sold hawk feathers in bundles of four for 1 gp.[9]
